items.content_html: A lightweight and secure Node.js SDK for implementing passwordless authentication in your applications using MojoAuth's authentication services.
items.title: MojoAuth/node-sdk: A lightweight and secure Node.js SDK for implementing passwordless authentication in your applications using MojoAuth's authentication services.

items.content_html: A lightweight and modern utility to mask input fields with password-like characters. This library is specifically designed to prevent password managers from automatically saving values, making it ideal for sensitive data handling. It also provides a method to retrieve the original value of the input. Fully compatible with JavaScript and TypeScript.
items.title: krozamdev/masked-password: A lightweight and modern utility to mask input fields with password-like characters. This library is specifically designed to prevent password managers from automatically saving values, making it ideal for sensitive data handling. It also provides a method to retrieve the original value of the input. Fully compatible with JavaScript and TypeScript.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
items.title: YashRajput09/BlogBreez: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.

items.content_html: HNSW Lite is a lightweight and fast of the HNSW algorithm for approximate nearest-neighbor search. This repository provides an easy-to-use npm package for JavaScript and TypeScript developers.
